main-input: bg-[#181818] sticky block main-input z-30 h-20 text-white focus:ring-0 rounded-lg text-3xl w-full
main-input-wrapper: sticky top-0 mx-auto w-full transition-all items-center p-4 bg-[#131213]
search-icon: hidden opacity-100 pointer-events-none relative left-4 h-5 w-5 text-gray-400 z-10
result-heading: z-0 px-3 py-2.5 text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-200
result-item: items-center group flex cursor-pointer  overflow-hidden p-3 rounded-lg
result-item-icon: flex h-[50px] w-[50px] flex-none items-center justify-center overflow-hidden rounded-lg mr-5
alert-wrapper: h-full absolute w-full top-0 items-end flex justify-end
alert: gap-4 grid text-white alert bottom-3 w-1/2 right-0 mt-3 transition-opacity ease-in-out duration-800 p-3 grid-cols-[auto_1fr]
